resource_value: 45,655,000 t @ 1.26 g/t Au containing 1,844,200 oz Au

source_sentence: The Capricorn Gold-Copper Belt Project tenements surround the historically prolific Mt Morgan gold mine in Queensland (Mt Morgan Mine) which operated from 1883 until 1981, producing ~50 Mt of ore at 4.99 g/t Au and 0.72% Cu, containing 7.65 million ounces of Au, 1.2 million ounces of Ag and 360kt of Cu.1, 2, 3
